definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: I don't know. Everybody outside the main building was shot.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道，主楼外面的所有人都被枪杀了。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻将屋位于主楼5楼，集住宿娱乐于一体。

sentences.english: There was utter pandemonium outside the university building as ambulances carted away the injured.
sentences.chinese: 随着救护车带走受伤的人，大学主楼外绝对乱成一团。

sentences.english: The hotel composed of one attached buildings and a main building .
sentences.chinese: 酒店由一座主楼和一座裙楼组成。

sentences.english: Turret and the main building is the city's only high-level structure of wood construction.
sentences.chinese: 主楼与角楼是城内唯一的高层木结构建筑。

sentences.english: The screen door on the main building sprang open, and a short, slender woman appeared.
sentences.chinese: 主楼的纱门敞开着，一位娇小玲珑的女人出现在眼前。

sentences.english: The main building was originally a two-storey structure to which an extra storey was added in the 1920s.
sentences.chinese: 主楼原为两层高，后于一九二零年代加建一层。

sentences.english: When the plane arrived,some of the detectives were waiting inside the main building.
sentences.chinese: 当飞机到达时，一些侦探等候在主楼里。

sentences.english: She's looking down on the continued bustling activity of the main terminal concourse .
sentences.chinese: 她俯视候机主楼大厅里持续的熙熙攘攘的活动。

sentences.english: Anther important scenery of YaoWan, back side of main building for ShanXi assembly hall .
sentences.chinese: 窑湾另外一个重要景点，山西会馆主楼背面。

sentences.english: Guangyue tower by building and building is composed of two parts, a total of 33 meters high.
sentences.chinese: 光岳楼由楼基和主楼两部分组成，总高33米。

sentences.english: A:We are standing in front of the main building of this old palace.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在主楼前面这些旧宫殿。

sentences.english: After class, all the students in the annex where our class met walked back to the main building.
sentences.chinese: 下课后，全班同学从上课的辅楼走回主楼。

sentences.english: The structural plane is a half-arc plane according to the need of architecture sculpt.
sentences.chinese: 由于建筑造型需要，主楼采用半圆弧形平面。

sentences.english: Telegraph wires radiate like cobwebs from the main building.
sentences.chinese: 电报线像蜘蛛网似地由主楼向四面八方伸展。

sentences.english: Left of the Arkham Mansion stairs is a locked-off courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 阿克汉姆主楼楼梯左边有一个锁住的庭院。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
